To increase your chances of finding a suitable flight, I recommend:

2. **Check Delta's website or mobile app**: Log in to your SkyMiles account and search for flights on Delta's website or mobile app to get the most up-to-date availability.
3. **Consider alternative airports**: If you have multiple airport options, you might find better redemption opportunities.
4. **Book in advance**: The earlier you book, the better your chances of securing a redemption flight.

Before booking, make sure to review the flight details, including the layovers, flight duration, and seat selection.

If you're ready to book, you can proceed with redeeming your SkyMiles on Delta's website or mobile app. If you need more assistance or have further questions, feel free to ask!
